name: Hydriol® PGI
description: HYDRIOL® PGI is compatible with most oils and emollients from polar to apolar and can be used in high-performance W/O emulsifier for the production of modern, light W/O creams and W/O lotions. The liquid form enables the energy-saving and substance-friendly production of emulsions in the cold/cold process. HYDRIOL® PGI enables the production of formulations with a very pleasant, non-sticky skin feel. To increase the stability of thin, sprayable W/O lotions and W/O milks, we recommend using HYDRIOL® PGI together with HYDRIOL® PGR. You will find numerous examples of formulations with HYDRIOL® PGI in our collection of formulations. HYDRIOL® PGI is oxidation stable and suitable for the production of water-resistant sun protection formulations. In decorative formulations such as lipsticks or make-up foundations, HYDRIOL® PGI helps to improve texture and distribution.
